bookTitle: The Secret in the Old Attic
Plot: First published in 1944, this mystery finds Nancy searching for some unpublished musical manuscripts which she believes are hidden in the dark, cluttered attic of a rundown mansion.
Characters: Nancy Drew, Carson Drew, Bess Marvin, George Fayne, Hannah Gruen, Effie Schneider, Philip March (Nancy Drew), Susan March, Horace Lally
